name: Devcom 1
description:
The game was made in less than 24hr. Because I think of making the code open source I decided to not use any external assets. This is also one of the reasons why I haven't even tought about adding any audio. 

Besides that it is also a nice challange to write everything on your own. E.g. I really missed my tweening-lib. 

Thanks for playing the game and enjoy beating your own highscore.
